maker: Produced in the Doccia Porcelain Factory, After models by Giovanni Battista Foggini, Probably made by Gaspero Bruschi, et al
title: Perseus and Medusa
description: Perseus and Medusa; Produced in the Doccia Porcelain Factory (Italian, about 1735 - 1896), After models by Giovanni Battista Foggini (Italian, 1652 - 1725), Probably made by Gaspero Bruschi (Italian, 1701 - 1780), et al; Doccia (outside Florence), Italy; about 1750; Hard-paste porcelain, polychrome enamel decoration, gilding; 45.1 × 33 × 28 cm, 8.1647 kg (17 3/4 × 13 × 11 in., 18 lb.); 94.SE.76.2; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
